notes: Weekly. Began with Nov. 1, 1882 issue; ceased with June 29, 1892 issue.--Cf. Historical directory of Saskatchewan newspapers, 1878-1983. -- Merged with: The Saskatchewan; to form: The Saskatchewan Times.
